description:
Honoka blames herself for not realizing that Kotori was suffering, and quits being a School Idol. Because of that, μ’s goes on hiatus and Honoka, who has no goal anymore, doesn`t even see Umi anymore. Despite all that happening, Honoka sees that Nico is continuing her training as a School Idol and after she gets an unexpected confession from Eli, Honoka makes a decision. The next morning, Umi goes to the auditorium after being summoned there by Honoka, and Honoka tells her how she really feels. Upon hearing that, Umi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: μ`sミュージックスタート!
